name: MODERN EQUIPMENT SALES AND RENTAL CO. and Modern Group, Ltd., Petitioners v. Ruick L. ROLLAND and Holly Rolland, H/W, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Modern Equipment Sales & Rental Co. v. Rolland

parties: MODERN EQUIPMENT SALES AND RENTAL CO. and Modern Group, Ltd., Petitioners v. Ruick L. ROLLAND and Holly Rolland, H/W, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of October, 2012, the Petition for Review and the Application for Leave to File a Reply Brief are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
55 A.3d 1043
MODERN EQUIPMENT SALES AND RENTAL CO. and Modern Group, Ltd., Petitioners v. Ruick L. ROLLAND and Holly Rolland, H/W, Respondents.
